caption.body: Filmmaker Naghmeh Farzaneh, who left Iran for the United States during the “Arab Spring” of 2010–12, communicates the anxiety, alienation, and complex range of emotions shared with other immigrants in this beautifully composed, hand-drawn animation.  See "Scent of Geranium" by Naghmeh Farzaneh, now playing in the Video Arts gallery, located pre-security in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/2uCDEd9
caption.excerpt: Filmmaker Naghmeh Farzaneh, who left Iran for the United States during the “Arab Spring” of 2010–12, communicates the anxiety, alienation, and complex range of emotions shared with other immigrants in this beautifully composed, hand-drawn animation.
